## Biography

Laila is a senior undergraduate studying Psychology and Cognitive Science, with a minor in Visual Design. She is passionate about understanding how people think, learn, and interact with the world around them - especially through the lens of inclusive design and storytelling. Outside of academics, Laila enjoys film photography, crocheting, and a good iced matcha latte!
